refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a new and initialized acquisition.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: h = btkNewAcquisition(pn, fn) h = btkNewAcquisition(pn, fn, an) h = btkNewAcquisition(pn, fn, an, r)

listitem.para: Number of points in the new acquisition
Number of frames for the points in the new acquisition
Number of analog channels in the new acquisition (default: 0)
Ratio between the number of analog samples and the number of point samples. (default: 1)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Return the handle h of an initialized biomechanical acquisition. The points created are tagged with the type 'Marker'. To change the type of theses points, use btkSetPointType or btkSetPoint.
This handle is returned as a 32-bit integer and can be only used with the btk* functions.
